data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Ok, let me talk about my talented friend. She is so good at organizing resources and I think she is the best leader I have ever seen. The first time I met her was at the beginning of my first year of university, she was the president of my degree's society. She organized interviews for the course societies and planed for activities to gather people together to make friends. She constructed a site to share us with academic resources and release important events and notifications related to coursework and development programs. She was being so helpful to all the cohorts. I think the characteristics that make her so outstanding are giving and being kind.
data.referenceText: Talk about a friend who you think is a good leader. Who is it? How did you meet and what makes them so great?
data.referenceTranslate: 谈论一个你认为是优秀领导者的朋友，他是谁?你们是怎么认识的?是什么让他们如此优秀?
